name: Student Grading System SQL注入漏洞（CNVD-2025-03172）
product: ["Student Grading System Student Grading System v1.0"]
description: Student Grading System是一个学生评分系统。Student Grading System 1.0版本存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于文件/view_students.php的参数id缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
厂商尚未提供漏洞修复方案，请关注厂商主页更新：
https://github.com/shaturo1337/POCs/blob/main/SQL%20Injection%20in%20Student%20Grading%20System.md
